body_html:
Sorry, I should have given out all BKMs in a batch. But, here is another important one that I've missed.

export OMP_NUM_THREADS=x
export KMP_BLOCKTIME=1
numactl -c 1 -m 1 python ... <inter_op> <intra_op>

body:
Sorry, I should have given out all BKMs in a batch. But, here is another important one that I've missed. 

export OMP_NUM_THREADS=x 
export KMP_BLOCKTIME=1 
numactl -c 1 -m 1 python ... <inter_op> <intra_op>
